modName: Unofficial Patch and Extras For Lovers in Skyrim - Multiple Lovers - Adopt child and pet - Not Multiple Marriage
descriptionHtml:
[u][size=6]My patch requires latest [url=http://www.darkcreations.org/files/file/1106-lovers-in-skyrim-multiple-lovers-adopt-child-and-pet-not-multiple-marriage/]Lovers in Skyrim[/url].[/size][/u]

There are several files. Choose one... or grab all!


[u][size=4]1. "All lovers must be quiet."[/size][/u]
Me: (reading a book)
Lover1: "Yes my love? What do you need?"
Other Lovers: "Yes my love? What do you need?"
Me: "AAAAAAAAAAARGH SHUT THE F*** UP WILL YOU!?"
... so I patched LiS. Now they won't say it repeatedly!
[i][u]INSTALL/UPGRADE[/u][/i]: Just install LiS normally, and overwrite my file.

[u]
[size=4]2. "Falkreath : Lakeview Manor Store Add-on"[/size][/u]
LiS only support 5 vanilla stores[*1]. (Whiterun, Markarth, Solitude, Windhelm, and Riften)
I'm living in Lakeview, so I made a store add-on!
[i][u]INSTALL(instructions from LiS author)[/u][/i]
1. Deactivate LiS esp.
2. Load, make a new save, and quit.
3. Activate LiS and "Lakeview_LiStore.esp". Load order: LiS 1st, my store 2nd. (use LOOT)
4. LiS will say "Add-on detected".
5. Set workplace [u]near the store[/u] for Lover 1 and Lover 2.


[size=4][u][b]3. "LiS Modder's guide" Additional guide[/b][/u][/size]
If you're making your own store mod like me, you might need this.


[b][u][size=4]4. "Pinewatch extra beds"[/size][/u][/b]
Add [u]10 beds[/u] to [url=http://uesp.net/wiki/Skyrim:Pinewatch]Pinewatch[/url]... for lovers :-P
Does NOT require LiS or Heathfire...
This mod won't cause problems; I didn't touch underground dungeon.
[i][u]INSTALL[/u][/i]: Go far away from Lakeview or Pinewatch before install.
[u]This mod's license(No.4) is "[b][url=https://en.wikisource.org/wiki/Creative_Commons_Attribution-NonCommercial-ShareAlike_3.0_Unported]CC BY-NC-SA 3.0[/url][/b]"[/u]; feel free to edit for your lovers!!


*1
[url=http://www.darkcreations.org/files/file/1105-spouses-store-in-skyrim-working-spouse-earn-your-money/]SSiS[/url] and [url=http://www.darkcreations.org/files/file/1103-serana-is-my-lover-and-my-spouse/]SiML[/url] already support Lakeview manor.

---
To moderators: I got a permission from LiS author, so don't worry.
author: gr33nsk1n
